# LLM Token Counter

A clean, high-performance tokenization playground. Compare how different Large Language Models "see" your text, with support for OpenAI, Meta, Google, and Mistral tokenizers.

---

## Features

* **Multi-Model Support:** Switch between GPT-4o, LLaMA, Gemini, and legacy models via a simple dropdown.
* **Visual Breakdown:** View the exact strings generated by the tokenizer.
* **Live Counting:** Accurate token counts based on model-specific encodings.
* **Gradio UI:** A modern, responsive interface for easy interaction.

---

## Supported Tokenizers

| Provider       | Models                               |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| OpenAI         | GPT-4o, GPT-4, GPT-3.5, GPT-2, Codex |
| Meta           | LLaMA                                |
| Google         | Gemini (SentencePiece-based)         |
| Mistral        | Mistral-7B                           |
| Anthropic/X.AI | Claude & Grok (via cl100k_base)      |

---

## Quick Start

**Install Dependencies:**

```bash
pip install -r Requirements.txt
```

**Run the App:**

```bash
python TokenCounter.py
```
